mapper.select: SELECT a.ID, a.REAL_NAME, a.DEPART_NAME, a.TOTAL, a.USED, (a.TOTAL - a.USED) AS SHENG FROM ( SELECT u.ID, u.REAL_NAME, d.NAME AS DEPART_NAME, IFNULL( sum( CASE y.OPT_TYPE WHEN '0' THEN y.DAYS END ), 0 ) AS TOTAL, IFNULL( sum( CASE y.OPT_TYPE WHEN '1' THEN y.DAYS END ), 0 ) AS USED FROM oa_hr_user u LEFT JOIN sys_depart d ON u.DEPT_ID = d.ID LEFT JOIN oa_hr_year_holiday y ON u.ID = y.USER_ID GROUP BY u.ID, u.REAL_NAME, d.NAME order by d.NAME, u.REAL_NAME ) a
